824030433641951200,Tue Jan 24 23:05:39 +0000 2017,I conclude with the latest in a zoning board battle that was underway in 2011 when I started at @TheRecordNJ: https://t.co/DsKfmFQtNj
824027513550733300,Tue Jan 24 22:54:03 +0000 2017,Local papers don't just matter when they help break national news - Bridgegate, heroin, Penn State. They matter for the little stories.
824023796780793900,Tue Jan 24 22:39:17 +0000 2017,The White House matters. But there are thousands of public officials across the US who may never have to answer to a single reporter.
824022455887007700,Tue Jan 24 22:33:57 +0000 2017,Thank you! Keep it coming! https://t.co/7MFQQMemFy
824020628390998000,Tue Jan 24 22:26:42 +0000 2017,When local papers die out, we lose more than jobs and talented reporters. We lose voices. We lose rights. We lose our way.
824018101930967000,Tue Jan 24 22:16:39 +0000 2017,How many courthouses in America don't see a single reporter in a calendar year? How many zoning votes go unnoticed? How many elections?
824016926871523300,Tue Jan 24 22:11:59 +0000 2017,Let's not lose sight of the less visible troubles facing journalism today, i.e., the gutting of local newspapers. https://t.co/ysTwvF5HBN
824014553679806500,Tue Jan 24 22:02:33 +0000 2017,“From what we can tell, the cloud of Mordor is descending across the federal service - https://t.co/Zerq4c3rCo
